channel.title: Auto-Messaging System?
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I need a full tutorial on how to add an auto messaging system where it would say (e.g. Vote for us at:________) every 5 minutes.
Please help out![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2009, 10:08:13 pm[/size][hr]Help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 11:23:24 am[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 03:52:00 pm[/size][hr]Please Help out!
